text.autoconfig.qualitysounds.title: Quality Sounds Configuration
text.autoconfig.qualitysounds.option.blo: Block Sounds
Individual Block Sound Groups
Acacia Leaves and Acacia Sapling
Acacia Leaves and Sapling will now use a new sound group
Acacia Log and Acacia Wood
Acacia Log and Wood will now use a new sound group
Acacia Pressure Plate, Acacia Fence, Acacia Fence Gate, Acacia Sign, Acacia Door, Acacia Trapdoor, and Acacia Button
Acacia Pressure Plate, Fence, Fence Gate, Sign, Door, Trapdoor, and Button will now use the same sound group as Acacia Planks
Acacia Planks, Acacia Slab, Acacia Stairs, Stripped Acacia Log, and Stripped Acacia Wood
Acacia Planks, Slab, Stairs, Stripped Log, and Stripped Wood will now use a new sound group
Barrel
Barrel will now use a new sound group
Beehive
Beehive will now use a new sound group
Birch Leaves and Birch Saplings
Birch Leaves will now use same sound group as Cherry Leaves
Birch Log, Birch Wood, Birch Trapdoor
Birch Log and Wood will now use a new sound group

Birch Pressure Plate, Fence, Fence Gate, Sign, Button, and Slab will now use a new sound group
Birch Planks, Birch Stairs, Stripped Birch Log, and Stripped Birch Wood
Birch Planks, Stairs, Stripped Log, and Stripped Wood will now use a new sound group

Bookshelf will now use a new sound group

Gravel will now use a new sound group

Jungle Leaves and Jungle Saplings

Jungle Pressure Plate, Jungle Fence, Jungle Fence Gate, Jungle Sign, Jungle Door, Jungle Trapdoor, and Jungle Button
